com.ikueb.wallclock

Class FixedClock

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.time.Clock
      • com.ikueb.wallclock.AbstractFixedWallClock
        • com.ikueb.wallclock.FixedClock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FixedWallClock, WallClock, java.io.Serializable

    public final class FixedClock
extends AbstractFixedWallClock
implements java.io.Serializable
    A mutable WallClock implementation that provides a fixed instant.
    Both dates and times are settable.
    See Also:
    AbstractFixedWallClock, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static long serialVersionUID 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FixedClock()
      Creates an instance based on the current UTC date and time.
      FixedClock(java.time.Clock clock)
      Creates an instance based on the given Clock.
      FixedClock(java.time.Instant instant, java.time.ZoneId zoneId)
      Creates an instance based on the given instant and time-zone.
      FixedClock(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Creates an instance based on the date's midnight at UTC.
      FixedClock(java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Creates an instance based on the date and time at UTC.
      FixedClock(java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime, java.time.ZoneId zoneId)
      Creates an instance based on the date and time at the specified time-zone.
      FixedClock(java.time.LocalDate date, java.time.ZoneId zoneId)
      Creates an instance based on the date's midnight at the specified time-zone.
      FixedClock(java.time.LocalTime time)
      Creates an instance based on the time today at UTC.
      FixedClock(java.time.LocalTime time, java.time.ZoneId zoneId)
      Creates an instance based on the time today at the specified time-zone.
      FixedClock(WallClock wallClock)
      Creates an instance based on the given WallClock.
      FixedClock(java.time.ZonedDateTime source)
      Creates an instance based on the date, time and specified time-zone.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o) 
      int hashCode() 
      FixedClock offset(java.time.Duration duration)
      Adds the duration to this clock, zero-length durations are treated as no-op.
      FixedClock setDate(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Sets the date of this clock, the same day is treated as no-op.
      FixedClock setDateTime(java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Sets the date and time of this clock, the same date and time is treated as no-op.
      FixedClock setTime(java.time.LocalTime time)
      Sets the time of this clock, the same time is treated as no-op.
      java.time.Clock withZone(java.time.ZoneId zone)

      • FixedClock

        public FixedClock(java.time.Instant instant,
                  java.time.ZoneId zoneId)
        Creates an instance based on the given instant and time-zone.
        The immutable version of this can be Clock.fixed(Instant, ZoneId).
        Parameters:
        instant - the instant to use, not null
        zoneId - the time-zone to use, not null
